items.title: Unity Networking From Scratch for (Unity 5 to Unity 2020)

visible_instructors.title: Penny de Byl
visible_instructors.job_title: International Award Winning Professor & Best Selling Author
visible_instructors.name: Penny

items.headline: An Introduction to Unity's UNET API
objectives_summary: Create multiplayer games and connect Unity created applications over a network.
Understand the different roles played by servers and clients in a network.
Be able to use remote procedure calls to synchronise player-character states in a networked game.

items.title: Unity & C# - Build A Complete 2D Mobile Platformer Game

visible_instructors.name: AbleGamesDev

items.headline: Learn How to Develop a Complete 2D Mobile Platformer Game in Unity C# From Start to Launch in Google Play Store
objectives_summary: Create a mobile platformer from scratch to launch in Google Play Store
Easily monetize your game with AdMob banner and interstitial ads
Master Sixteen Popular Platformer Game Mechanics like Background Parallax, Breakable Crates, Coin Pickup Effects and more

items.title: How to Make Tile Based Platform Games in Gamemaker Studio 2

visible_instructors.title: Peter Morgan
visible_instructors.job_title: Game Maker, Mobile Developer and Teacher
visible_instructors.name: Peter

items.headline: Learn the basics to build fun and creative platform games, including tricks to add polished and professional features.
objectives_summary: You will develop a robust platform engine that you can use for future games you make.
You will learn how to do fast tile based collisions, and have the skills to incorporate it into your own games.
You will learn how to implement a customizable lighting system that any object in the game can use.

objectives_summary: Learn To Code in C#
Develop strong and transferrable problem solving skills
Learn good coding and design patterns

items.title: Complete C# Unity Developer: Create Games and Learn to Code
items.headline: Game development & design taught by using Unity. Learn C# and build your first games for web, mobile and desktop.
objectives_summary: Learn the powerful programming language C# from scratch.
Gain best practices knowledge of game development and design.
Get used to Unity.

items.title: Unreal Engine 4 - VFX for Games - Beginner to Intermediate
items.headline: You will have started your own portfolio of AAA Visual Effects for Games by the end of this course.
objectives_summary: Create effects for games in Unreal Engine 4 with Niagara.
Fundamental concepts about Visual Effects.
Creating Textures, Meshes and Shaders for Game VFX.

Enhance your 3D game worlds with clever lighting strategies
Build fast and efficient lighting setups  for early prototyping of games

items.headline: Game development made easy. Learn C# using Unity and create your very own classic RPG!
objectives_summary: Learn C#, a modern versatile programming language.
Understand the capabilities of 2D development in Unity.
Develop strong and transferrable problem solving skills.

items.title: Intro to Game Development using Unity - Part I

visible_instructors.job_title: Software Engineer, Game Developer, and Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Ken

items.headline: A 2D game will be developed from scratch - perfect beginning course for middle and high school age students!
objectives_summary: Build a basic 2D game using Unity with knowledge and confidence.
Gain an understanding of the game development process.
Use your new Unity skills to create your own games.

items.headline: An exploration of robust modularised code building for games with Unity 2019 and C#.
objectives_summary: How to create robust, reusable modularised code for use in games programming.
How to implement repeatable solutions to address common game programming problems.

items.title: Unreal Engine Blueprints - The Ultimate Developer Course
items.headline: Create three complete video games including a mobile game without a single line of code!
objectives_summary: Students will create 3 complete games including a mobile game and will test it on their mobile device.
Students will learn how to get beautiful game props, characters and environments online for free.
Students will learn Unreal Engine's Blueprint scripting system, which they will use to create gameplay.

items.title: Make a Match-Three Puzzle Game in Unity
items.headline: Make a match-three game from scratch!
objectives_summary: Make their own match-three puzzle game to be deployed on PC/Mac or their mobile device!
Create a tile-based 2D game in Unity

items.title: Procedural Terrain Generation with Unity

visible_instructors.title: Penny de Byl
visible_instructors.job_title: International Award Winning Professor & Best Selling Author
visible_instructors.name: Penny

items.headline: Programming realistic environments with C# through the algorithmic manipulation of mesh and vegetation data.
objectives_summary: Use various algorithmic approaches to create procedurally generated content.
Manipulated terrain meshes with code to create realistic looking landscapes.
Texture terrain meshes procedurally.

items.title: SolidWorks Complete Course: Learn 3D Modeling in SolidWorks
items.headline: SolidWorks 3D Modeling: The Ultimate Guide to 3D Modeling in SolidWorks. 3D Modeling Techniques. SolidWorks 3D Modeling
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of SolidWorks
Learn to create 3D Models and 2D Drawings
Learn the advanced functionality and capabilities of SolidWorks
